meta.label: AKS Cluster identity
meta.description: AKS Components identity management (control plane, kubelets)

params.name: identityType
params.label: Identity type
params.description: Select the type of identity and the method of specifying it

params.name: controlPlaneUserAssignedIdentity
params.label: Control plane user identity
params.description: User Assigned Managed Identity for the control plane, as Resource Id. If empty, a System Assigned Managed identity will be used.

params.name: kubeletUserAssignedIdentity
params.label: Kubelet user identity (Azure preview only)
params.description: User Assigned Managed Identity for the kubelets, as Resource Id. If empty, a System Assigned Managed identity will be used. Only available as a preview feature in Azure.
